description:
Stuck at the same spots? No time to read reviews and spend ages finding where to eat? We make it easy! With TasteTown, you can discover hundreds of top venues nearby—simply and clearly. Plus, enjoy perks you’ll love:

- Exclusive discounts: Buy one, get one free; up to 50% off; or free drinks.

- No commitments: Try one DEAL free, no payment details needed.

- Membership: Unlimited discoveries with a monthly or annual subscription—the investment usually pays off after the first use.

- Invite friends: Get one month free for each friend!

So what are you waiting for? Download TasteTown and explore your city’s flavors with benefits!

We know where you can find the flavours that fit you.  If there's one thing we know it’s food delivery. It’s our mission to bring tasty food from your favourite local restaurant right to your door so you can eat good food everyday. We'll go the extra mile to make your order the greatest food experience in the world. Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or the freshest sushi? We know the best food for every cuisine that your city has to offer. foodora is the best food delivery and take away service in your city -- so let's take the first bite!

Check if we're in your city by downloading the app.

SO WHAT’S THE DEAL?

You’re ready and waiting to eat, we’ve all been there, dreaming of thai food, eating burgers in our dreams. Here’s what we do: first choose between delivery and Pick-Up to fit food ordering seamlessly into your schedule. Pick-Up is simple -- you make your order and then collect your food from the restaurant once it’s ready. No more queuing, ever (our app is magic). If you choose delivery, our couriers will bring the food you've been lusting after right to your door. Dreams really do come true.

HOW IT WORKS

First, enter your address (home/ office/ treehouse). Then, choose your favourite restaurant and place an order. They’ll prepare your food and once it’s ready, our courier bring it to you. If you need something to watch, you can track your rider in real-time. Then you eat. Food goals.

WHAT MAKES US SPECIAL

foodora chooses your local favourites; the best food near you. Vietnamese or Italian, healthy salads or food to nurse your hangover -- your dinner will be cooked with love and care. Our riders come to your very doorstep with a smile while you save time to do something else you love. There's a cuisine and a dish to suit every moment, and we'll help you make the first bite last.

ANYTHING ELSE?

Of course your safety is important to us. We guarantee secure, simple mobile payment, so you can eat when you're hungry and pay however you like.

TALK TO US

If you’ve ordered with us before, we’d want to know what you think. Give us your food thoughts/ teenage confessionals. Let us be your notepad.
Email us at support@foodora.se

For further info, visit
www.foodora.com/

Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Máš hlad? Honí tě mlsná? Lednička je daleko? Sporák není tvůj parťák? Nevadí. Objednávej svoje oblíbené jídlo z Bageterie Boulevard jednoduše a rychle přímo ze svého telefonu.

V několika málo krocích, pohodlně a přehledně. S rozvozem nebo k vyzvednutí na pobočce. Je to na tobě.

"(B)eat food waste and get yourself some tasty bites! 

With Nesnězeno application you can get unsold products of great quality at a discounted price from local restaurants, bakeries, hotels and grocery stores.
Explore more than 3000 partners' packages in the whole country and purchase for even 50-70% off!
All of the surprise packages contain high-quality food, so you're not only doing good for the environment or your wallet, but also for yourself.
With the Nesnězeno application, you can not only save food at a discount at your favourite places, but also get to know new shops, bakeries or restaurants.
Follow these easy steps and start (b)eating food waste with a few clicks:
1. Download the app
2. Explore the available discount packages
3. Purchase and pay for them easily via the app
4. Get the package in the specified time slot
5. Enjoy delicious food that you just saved
You are only one registration away from stepping on the path of sustainability where we can (b)eat food waste together!

The Strava app for iOS is used to order food on the internet portal strava.cz from a mobile device with the iOS operating system. Ordering food via the Internet is part of the catering systems supplied by the company VIS Plzeň, s.r.o. For users, it provides practically the same functionality as accessing the portal via a web browser.
Send suggestions or error reports to info@strava.cz. 

If you have problems with the application, please refer to the knowledge base available at http://bit.ly/2wklWN9.

Qerko was born from our desire to make paying in restaurants, bistros and cafés easier. We didn’t want to spend any more time waiting in the queue at the bar or complicatedly separate the bill with our friends at one table.

And we pursued this smart payment system beyond gastronomy borders! Download the app, scan the QR code and easily pay with just a swipe. You will get your receipt right after payment in your e-mail and in the profile in app, too.

Registration and adding the payment method can be done in less than a minute. Qerko app represents revolution in payment, so let yourself be part of it and decide on your own, when and how you are going to pay. 

What is more, with Qerko, you can get rewards in the loyalty program too.

Benefits of the app:
• Easy pay your bill or its part in a restaurant.
• No more wasting time waiting till the waiter comes.
• Comfy payment via QR code in a restaurant or at your TV screen.
• You need only your mobile phone to pay.
• You get rewards in the loyalty program just for paying.
• Many payment methods so everyone can choose - Visa, Mastercard, meal voucher cards Edenred, Sodexo or Benefit Plus or Apple Pay

Popeyes is in the city! Stáhni si aplikaci Popeyes® a vychutnej si chuť křupavého a šťavnatého kuřete přímo z New Orleans. Na co máš dnes chuť? Koukni se na menu se špetkou louisianské chuti s cajun kořením! 


Objednej přes aplikaci a vyzvedni si na místě


Přeskoč frontu a objednej si jídlo rychleji díky aplikaci Popeyes®, která na tebe už čeká! Y´all ready?!


Najdi nejbližší restauraci ve svém okolí


Nejseš si jistý/á, kde se nachází nejbližší restaurace Popeyes? Použij vyhledávač restaurací a najdi pobočku, které je ti nejblíže. Tak na viděnou!

Free coffee is just a Star away with a brand-new Starbucks app!

The Starbucks® Rewards app is a convenient and easy way to pay in store, keep track of your Stars, earn free drinks, and check your Starbucks® Rewards membership level anytime. Watch Stars add up fast towards free drinks and special benefits, boost your coffee experience with exclusive offers dropped on your inbox. With our brand new app it's easy to plan your next coffee - see stores near you, get directions and view opening hours store before you make the trip.

Here’s how it works:
Scan the code on your app every time you make a purchase and collect Stars based on how much you spend. Get 1 Star for every 12Kč that you spend on beverages, food, coffee at home products or merchandise*.
For every 100 Stars, have a drink on us. That's us adding a little sparkle to your day.
At 200 Stars, you've reached Gold Level. Gold Members get extra shot of espresso, selected syrups, or whipped cream - all on the house. Plus enjoy a Birthday drink and free brewed coffee refill on us too, you deserve it!

Jídlo pod nos je česká aplikace, díky které si objednáte jídlo z vaší oblíbené restaurace na pár kliků — domů, do práce nebo kamkoli, kde právě jste.
Jsme česká rodinná firma z Karlových Varů a usilujeme o poctivou, dostupnou a přátelskou službu pro všechny.

I proto nás najdete také v menších městech, ale jídlo přivezeme i daleko za jejich hranice.
Jídlo rozvážíme ve dvou termoboxech, z nichž jeden je elektricky vyhřívaný. A když budete něco potřebovat, dovoláte se nám na telefonní Horké lince — vždy mluvíte s člověkem, ne s robotem.

Pro naše uživatele máme bohatý benefitní program — sbírejte kredity, využívejte cashback od restaurací nebo věrnostní program na dopravu ZDARMA.

Stáhněte si aplikaci, registrujte se a začněte šetřit čas i peníze — na to, co je pro vás opravdu důležité. 



Proč Jídlo pod nos?

Česká firma s rodinnými hodnotami
Intuitivní aplikace ve vašem jazyce
Rozvážíme i tam, kam ostatní nejezdí
Elektricky vyhřívaný termobox
Horká linka — mluvíte s lidmi, ne s roboty

Crunchy chicken goodness at your fingertips!

KFC CZ application contains all the necessary functionality for fans of delicious chicken specialities in the Czech Republic.

- You can find the nearest restaurant and all the important info
- You can check the restaurant menu
- You can directly order KFC Delivery service in the Czech Republic
- You can order&pickup into your favourite KFC restaurant in the Czech Republic
- You can use special coupons and limited offers for KFC Delivery service in the Czech Republic

app_name: Too Good To Go: End Food Waste
description:
Too Good To Go is your smart way to enjoy tasty food at great value, while doing good for the planet. Winner of the 2023 ‘Cultural Impact’ category at the prestigious Apple App Store Awards, the #1 app to reduce food waste helps you save delicious, unsold snacks, meals, and ingredients from local shops, cafés, supermarkets, restaurants, and top brands—all at great prices. 

In a world where 40% of food produced goes to waste each year, reducing food waste is the #1 action we can take to help tackle climate change. With Too Good To Go, you can unlock affordable meals and grocery items while helping to save the planet. Together, we have the power to make a real difference.



HOW TOO GOOD TO GO WORKS:

EXPLORE AND DISCOVER
Download the app to explore a map showing nearby restaurants, cafés, bakeries, supermarkets or trusted brands offering good food at a great price, ready to be rescued.

SAVE YOUR SURPRISE BAG OR TOO GOOD TO GO PARCEL
Browse a variety of Surprise Bags filled with tasty, unsold food—whether it’s sushi, pizza, burgers, or fresh fruits and veggies. Prefer to get your favourite food brands delivered to you? Save a Too Good To Go Parcel packed with good food from the brands you love, at great prices. 

AFFORDABLE EATS
Save a Surprise Bag or a Too Good To Go Parcel at ½ price or less. 

RESERVE YOUR SAVE
Confirm your purchase through the app to reserve your Surprise Bag and rescue these delicious meals from going to waste. By rescuing food, you save money and help fight food waste.

ENJOY
Collect your Surprise Bag at the scheduled time, or have your Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.


WHY TOO GOOD TO GO?:

WALLET-FRIENDLY INDULGENCE
Enjoy quality meals at affordable prices, satisfying both your taste buds and your wallet.

VARIETY AND CHOICE
Too Good To Go partners with a wide selection of local favourites and top brands, offering everything from sushi, pizza, baked and fresh goods to easy-to-store staple grocery items such as snacks, drinks, sweets or pasta.

ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT
Each meal saved avoids CO2e emissions and the unnecessary use of water and land resources. By rescuing food from going to waste, you take a step towards a greener, cleaner planet. 

EASY PURCHASE PROCESS
The app’s simple and user-friendly interface makes it easy to browse, choose, and save Surprise Bags or Too Good To Go Parcels.

CONVENIENCE
Pick up your Surprise Bag at the designated time, or have a Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.

JOIN THE TOO GOOD TO GO COMMUNITY
Join the community of food lovers making a positive impact on the environment. Download the app now and start reducing food waste, bite by bite. 
Reducing food waste is a key action to help tackle climate change. For more information, visit tgtg.to/claims

Download the Burger King® app and enjoy royal food at exceptional prices! 


ROYAL COUPONS



Discover the diversity of our menu and choose from the available offers that allow you to satisfy your hunger without burdening your wallet. New coupons appear regularly, don't miss out on the best bargains!



MENU IN YOUR POCKET


Do you love our burgers? Now you can have our menu in your pocket! 


RESTAURANT LOCATOR



Check out information about your nearest Burger King restaurant and opening hours



Here you are the King & Queen.
Here You Rule!

Online shopping is easier than ever. With Tesco Online Shopping app, you can easily and flexibly manage your daily shopping from anywhere online. Choose your favorite products or simply repeat your previous order. 

Choose the delivery time that best suits you. Any time from 8 am to 10pm. And have your order delivered to your door! We also have a click and collect service from our selected stores.

Benefits of Tesco Online shopping:
Choose from 14 000 high quality products!
Buy at the same price as in the store!
Choose the most convenient delivery time interval for you, from 8 am to 10 pm every day!

Discover Goulash: Your smart meal planning and grocery shopping companion

Say goodbye to meal planning stress with Goulash. Our app combines personalized recipes, smart shopping, and effortless grocery delivery – tailored just for you and your family.
Whether you're optimizing your budget, saving time, or simply looking for inspiration, Goulash makes cooking and shopping simple. Download now and start your journey to better meals and smarter shopping!

How It Works:
1. Select your dietary preferences, tastes, and household size.
2. Get a personalized menu with recipes tailored to your needs.
3. Create your shopping list and connect directly to Rohlik.cz.
4. Order everything you need for delivery or pickup.
5. Cook delicious meals with step-by-step video tutorials.

What You'll Get with Goulash:
- Family-friendly options: From kid-approved classics to easy weeknight meals.
- Budget-conscious recipes: Save money with optimized grocery lists and leftovers management.
- Healthy & sustainable choices: Reduce food waste with recipes that use every ingredient.
- Diverse cuisine: Explore Italian, vegetarian, seasonal, and more—over 500 chef-crafted recipes.
- Seasonal inspiration: Weekly updated recipes to keep your meals exciting and fresh.

WHAT MAKES GOULASH UNIQUE?
- Smarter shopping: Save up to 20% by reducing unnecessary purchases.
- Less food waste: Focus on sustainable cooking and utilize every ingredient.
- Stress-free cooking: No more "What's for dinner?" moments – we’ve got you covered.

TRUSTED BY FAMILIES IN CZECH REPUBLIC
"Goulash has transformed our weeknight meals. It's easy to use, saves us money, and makes cooking fun!" - Petra, Brno
"Thanks to Goulash, we’ve drastically reduced food waste at home. Highly recommend!" - Martin, Prague
"Love how it integrates grocery shopping  and meal planning. The app’s simplicity is amazing!" - Jana, Ostrava

JOIN THE GOULASH COMMUNITY
Thousands of families across the Czech Republic trust Goulash for meal inspiration, smarter shopping, and a better cooking experience. Download Goulash today and make meal planning effortless!
Terms and conditions apply. See details: https://gulas.app/podminky-a-pravidla/

Welcome to Eatr - the ultimate companion for everyone from cooking novices to seasoned chefs! 
Our app is designed to guide you through a culinary adventure tailored just for you. Whether you're pressed for time or looking to indulge in a leisurely cooking spree, Eatr has you covered.

Time Management in Your Kitchen:
Choose your cooking time - from quick 15-minute bites to sumptuous meals under an hour - and let Eatr plan your menu. Busy schedules have met their match with our smart, time-conscious recipes.

Get Inspired:
Dive into thousands of mouth-watering recipes. With Eatr, discover daily inspiration and never run out of ideas for your next meal.

Personalized Skills Journey:
Whether you’re just starting out or are a kitchen pro, Eatr grows with you. Select your skill level and get recipes that challenge and excite you, all the while expanding your culinary prowess.

Dietary Preferences? We Listen:
Keto? Vegan? Pescatarian? No matter your diet, Eatr offers personalized recommendations to keep you aligned with your lifestyle choices. Sticking to your diet was never this effortless or delightful.

Powerful Filters for Tailored Search:
With robust search filters for cuisine, diet, meal type, and more, find exactly what you fancy with just a few taps.


Ratings and Feedback:
Be part of a community where your opinion matters. Rate recipes, helping others and yourself to the best-tasting dishes.

Nutritional Insight:
Stay informed with detailed nutritional information for each recipe, ensuring you meet your health and fitness goals.



Easy Cooking with Step-by-Step Guides:
Clear, concise, and easy-to-follow instructions take the guesswork out of cooking. Enjoy the process as much as the result!

Terms of use: https://eatr.com/terms_of_service

The Official Thermomix® Cookidoo® App gives you access to the growing universe of mouth-watering Thermomix® Guided Cooking recipes. You pick and choose which recipes go with you wherever you are. Create an account and get cooking!


SMART @ HEART
Connect to Cookidoo® and access over 100,000 worldwide recipes directly from your app and through the screen of the Thermomix® TM6. Also, be sure to check out the exclusive step-by-step photos and videos, making cooking easier than ever.


YOUR THERMOMIX® COOKIDOO® ACCOUNT
To use the app, you need to have your Thermomix® Cookidoo® username and password. Your local Thermomix® Cookidoo® website will tell you how to create your account for the app.


GET INSPIRED
Wondering what to cook today? Discover hundreds of ideas for every taste, season and occasion! With Cookidoo® membership, you get instant access to every recipe on Cookidoo®. Everything’s on the menu! Our recipe suggestions and articles will point you in the right direction.
 
 
CREATED RECIPES
Discover our newest Cookidoo® feature! You can create, import and modify your favourite recipes, save them all in one place and cook them with your Thermomix®. Your Thermomix®, your way.


PLAN AND COOK
Planning is easy and fun, add recipes to your planner and find the recipes ready for cooking when you need them. The Cook Today button on each recipe lets you schedule a recipe with a single click.


MAKE IT YOUR OWN
Create your own recipe lists to manage your recipes the way you want. Bookmark any recipe you find appealing so you can find it later. You can also view recipes you scheduled in the past.
 
 
COOK-KEY® BRINGS GUIDED COOKING TO YOUR FINGER TIPS
Cook-Key® connects your Thermomix® TM5 to Cookidoo®. Enjoy sending your recipe favourites, weekly plan and recipe collections from the iOS App to your Thermomix®.


Terms of Use:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

It's been already 5 years, since Lukáš Hejlík embarked on a quest to uncover all Bohemian and Moravian gastronomic secrets. Everyday, he drops a new tip on where it is worth to stop for brunch, lunch or a drink.

So far, he has visited 1,500 places, of which 1,000 are in this app. This app will help you uncover the hidden gems of Czech gastronomy.

Plan a trip and let Gastromapa be your guide.

The application would not exist were it not for its proud partner, craft mineral water Krondorf.

The official McDonald’s iPhone app!

Coupons, restaurants and your favorite products in a new design. Download our new app today:

- Current promotional products* and all our classics
- Coupons* for direct redemption at the restaurant, simply scan them at the counter
- Product finder with nutritional info
- Restaurant finder with opening hours, services and directions
- Mobile Order & Pay**


* Only at participating restaurants in Germany and Luxembourg.
** Mobile ordering and payment is currently only available in some restaurants. A list of participating restaurants can be found in the app. Mobile payment requires a valid VISA or Master Card credit card. The order function is only active if you are near a participating restaurant.

Ready to shift gear and become a foodora rider? It's easy: just sign up, get your equipment and start riding!

Deliver a lot, earn a lot: The more orders you deliver, the more you will earn
Flexible hours: Book shifts whenever you want and fit the work into your schedule
Transparency: Transparent earnings and payments

Experience the world of Nespresso on your iPhone or iPad.

The Nespresso app allows you to buy coffee capsules, machines and accessories on-the-go or at home on your iOS device.
Enjoy the Nespresso shopping experience anytime, anywhere:
•	Refill your stock of capsules and explore new coffees
•	Find the right machine for you, and exclusive accessories to complete your coffee corner at home
•	Stay up to date with the latest Nespresso Limited Edition coffees
•	Discover the nearest Nespresso points of interest on the store locator (Nespresso Boutiques, retail stores selling Nespresso coffee machines, and coffee capsule recycling points)
Do even more with the app with one of our ‘connected’ machines:
•	Get notified when your capsule stock is running low to ensure you never run out 
•	Navigate through recipes to nurture your inner barista
•	Ensure the best coffee experience cup after cup through regular notifications from your machine on when descaling is needed, or the water tank is nearly empty
•	Get direct access to machine “How-to” videos

Take advantage of our extensive delivery services*, such as:
•	Free Standard or Pick Up Point delivery on purchases of coffee capsules and machines
•	Nespresso Boutique Pick-Up
•	Nespresso Express delivery 
•	Nespresso Saturday & Sunday delivery
•	Nespresso Your Time (choose the most convenient date and time of your delivery)
*Availability and conditions of each service depend on your geographical area

V aplikaci Mixit.cz získáte nejrychlejší přístup k našim křupavým novinkám a výhodným akcím. Sbírejte speciální odměny a kredity za aktivitu přímo v aplikaci. Nyní si ještě snadněji můžete namíchat svoje müsli, kaši nebo mix ovoce, oříšků a čokolády. Vše vám v krásném tubusu pošleme až domů nebo si balíček vyzvednete na jednom z odběrných míst.

• Namixujte si vlastní mix müsli, kaše, ovoce nebo oříšků a čokolády
• Objevujte novinky a speciální výhodné akce přímo v aplikaci
• Okamžitý přístup do vašeho účtu a k vašim předchozím objednávkám
• Sbírejte speciální odměny a kredity za aktivitu přímo v aplikaci
